nodes.bodyText: I'd simply say: 1 for ascending, -1 for descending, 0 for no change

nodes.bodyText: Just asking: do we really need to duplicate all this long Props list here in TableProps and in TableDataHandler Props?
yes, otherwise the storybook docs addon doesn't list those properties
